name: ZerohBeat Adventure
description:
Adventure by ZerohBeat.
This game is a very short adventure style game with one true path. The main character wakes up one day with no idea what is going on… Its time to survive in this new reality.

The game features:
10 Chapters / choices with one true ending
Music and button effects
A very simple turn-based battle system
The game is available in English, Japanese or Bulgarian language
The game does not require a high end PC
The game is suitable for kids and adults
